content: corners with a slip_stitch and then working 1hdc ch2 1hdc into each of the corners § and 1 single_crochet into blo of each of the stitches of the previous round on the sides § there should be 21 scs to work on each side plus the 1hdc at each corner total 23 stitches on each side 18 congratulations you have a completed pockets of joy square j 19 yarning stories bythe yarny hobbit
